org.forgerock.openam.session.service

Class ServicesClusterMonitorHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.session.service.ServicesClusterMonitorHandler

  • @Singleton
public class ServicesClusterMonitorHandler
extends Object
    Singleton for managing access to the cluster monitor object. This is planned to be removed when cluster monitor is removed

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentHostServer

        public String getCurrentHostServer(SessionID sid)
                            throws SessionException
        This is a key method for "internal request routing" mode It determines the server id which is currently hosting session identified by sid. In "internal request routing" mode, this method also has a side effect of releasing a session which no longer "belongs locally" (e.g., due to primary server instance restart)
        Parameters:
        sid - session id
        Returns:
        server id for the server instance determined to be the current host
        Throws:
        SessionException

      • checkServerUp

        public boolean checkServerUp(String serverID)
        Actively check if server identified by serverID is up
        Parameters:
        serverID - server id
        Returns:
        true if server is up, false otherwise

      • isSiteUp

        public boolean isSiteUp(String siteId)
        Indicates that the Site is up.
        Parameters:
        siteId - A possibly null Site Id.
        Returns:
        True if the Site is up, False if it failed to respond to a query.
